name: tm88
effect: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user pecks the foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the user plucks it and
gains its effect.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user pecks the foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the user plucks it and
gains its effect.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user pecks the foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the user plucks it and
gains its effect.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
plucks it and gains its effect.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
plucks it and gains its effect.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
While it is asleep, the user randomly uses
one of the moves it knows.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of
the moves it knows.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of
the moves it knows.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of
the moves it knows.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user turns the ground to grass for five turns.
This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a
little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.
